tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sustainable_building_materials (
  material_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  material_name VARCHAR(100),
  material_type VARCHAR(50),
  material_description TEXT,
  cost_per_unit DECIMAL(10, 2),
  availability_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE construction_projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    project_location VARCHAR(255),
    material_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES sustainable_materials(material_id)
);

CREATE TABLE projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    location TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE material_usage (
    usage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    material_id INT,
    quantity_used INT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_project FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES projects(project_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_material FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES building_materials(material_id)
);
CREATE TABLE sustainable_building_materials (id INT PRIMARY KEY, material_name VARCHAR(50), material_type VARCHAR(50), sustainability_rating INT);
CREATE TABLE material_properties (material_id INT PRIMARY KEY, property_name VARCHAR(50), property_value VARCHAR(50));
CREATE TABLE construction_projects (project_id INT PRIMARY KEY, project_name VARCHAR(100), start_date DATE, end_date DATE);

CREATE TABLE project_material_mapping (project_id INT, material_id INT, quantity INT, FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES construction_projects(project_id), FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES sustainable_building_materials(id));

CREATE TABLE project_materials(
  project_id INT,
  material_id INT,
  quantity INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES construction_projects(project_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES building_materials(material_id)
);

CREATE TABLE material_prices(
  material_id INT,
  supplier_id INT,
  price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  date_effective DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES building_materials(material_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES material_suppliers(supplier_id)
);
